term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - buffer-addition technique in analytical flame spectroscopy
term.title: buffer-addition technique

item.text: A technique in which an additive (called a spectrochemical buffer) is added to both the sample and reference solutions for the purpose of making the measure of the analyte less sensitive to variations in interferent concentration.
